text: tatha ahle kitaab mein se vo bhee hai, jisake paas chaandee-sone ka dher dharohar rakh do, to use tumhen chuka dega tatha unamen vo bhee hai, jisake paas ek deenaar[1] bhee dharohar rakh do, to tumhen nahin chukaayega, parantu jab sada usake sir par savaar raho. ye (baat) isalie hai ki unhonne kaha ki ummiyon ke baare mein hamapar koee dosh[2] nahin tatha allaah par jaanate hue jhooth bolate hain
